pullrequest.title: pro-pose-al: Rename "affixed to" to "attached to". Define terms up front

content.raw: The statement "change a pose by its attached to frame"  is not very clear to me. I think I understand it means that any movement due to degrees of freedom could result in a new pose. Maybe it can be rephrased? Also, the fact that **attached to** is mentioned can be confusing because this sentence is talking about `//pose`.
content.html: The statement "change a pose by its attached to frame" is not very clear to me. I think I understand it means that any movement due to degrees of freedom could result in a new pose. Maybe it can be rephrased? Also, the fact that attached to is mentioned can be confusing because this sentence is talking about //pose.
